Ceno Browser | İnterneti paylaş
Download Ceno Browser
Join 566,565 other users

The safest way to install Ceno Browser on your device is through the Google Play Store or Microsoft Store:

IMPORTANT:

Ceno has two modes of operation - Public and Personal. You can easily toggle between them. Public mode offers the best connectivity but the least privacy - websites that you visit or share are recorded in a publicly-accessible registry (BitTorrent). Personal mode eliminates this record but may be slower and less efficient at retrieving content. See the FAQ or User Manual for more details on Ceno usage.

Ayrıca, Ceno uygulamasını Paskoocheh mağazası, GitHub, dComms ile kurabilir ya da doğrudan GitLab üzerinden APK dosyasını indirebilirsiniz:

Doğrudan indirme

Deneyimli kullanıcılar ya da yukarıdaki bağlantılardan Ceno Browser kuramayanlar doğrudan APK dosyasını indirebilirler:

Ceno for Android: arm64 (most common) / arm / x86_64

Ceno for Windows: x86_64 (system-install)

Run this to verify that the APK has a valid signature from the certificate with the fingerprint shown below:

> apksigner verify --print-certs ceno-[…].apk
Signer #1 certificate DN: CN=equalit.ie
Signer #1 certificate SHA-256 digest:
a59d20c076f6170a2c13d9ce96cd4349688f907898dfc3c89b0ae6ebe9f7edca
[…]

You can also verify the signatures of file hashes against our PGP key (with fingerprint 51BE 600C 2711 926C 865D F93F C7DC C123 F0DD B862)

Use Cases

Open blocked sites and social media

More and more resources are getting blocked every day. Ceno is a universal tool for accessing any website. Use public mode for reading news and browsing static sites, and switch to personal mode for social networks, YouTube, and other sites that require authentication.

Shutdowns

Even if a country is completely cut off from the global internet, you will still be able to access websites that Ceno caches and delivers to your country via satellite. Use Ceno as a backup in case of a shutdown!

Help others

Every Ceno user can become a bridge and help others access blocked resources. Simply enable Bridge mode in your browser settings and make the internet more accessible for those who need it most.

Ceno Browser is a project by eQualit.ie – a not-for-profit Canadian organization. Everyday, eQualitie's solutions enable freedom of association for millions of people online.
